title: [ww2]玩鳩英國 /英國遊戲/ 北極圈行動

replies.msg:
在二戰個陣 歐洲大陸淪​陷
英國首相邱吉爾下令組建The Special Operations Executive (SOE)
目的係令到被佔領區出現地下抵抗活動
會係英國搵同訓練特工
然後空投去歐洲大陸
去組織抵抗活動 同 比武器爆炸品抵抗活動
The Special Operations Executive (SOE) was created by the United Kingdom on July 22, 1940 in accordance with Prime Minister Winston Churchill's directive to "set Europe ablaze."[4] The objective of SOE was to undertake "irregular warfare" with sabotage and subversion in countries occupied by Nazi Germany and other Axis powers. SOE agents in occupied countries allied themselves with resistance groups and supplied them with weapons and equipment parachuted in from England.

其中係荷蘭係完全失敗

行動通訊好早就比德國人破解到
頭兩個特工41年11月空投
其中一個特工Lauwers 42年3月就被德國捉到
SOE's first two Dutch agents, wireless operator Huub Lauwers and saboteur Thys Taconis, parachuted into the Netherlands on the night of 6/7 November 1941. Lauwers was captured on 6 March 1942.


Lauwers 被人叫佢叛變
佢扮肯 然後打code 番英國個陣專登唔跟安全規距
等英國知佢已經被人捉咗
He was persuaded to send messages to SOE in London, but he omitted from the messages the two security checks (deliberate errors) that were required to be introduced into messages by the sending agent, the scheme for which was known only to the agent and SOE.

點知英國完全冇為意到
Lauwers 去到最尾直程大大隻字"捉" "咗" 咁寫埋落去
英國都冇發現到
Lauwers continued to transmit messages without the security checks and even inserted the letters CAU and GHT ("Caught") at the beginning and end of messages. SOE London paid no mind.

注: 佢冇死到, 2004年先過身

咁結果點?
由42年到44年
英國空投咗54個特工
大部份一落地就比德國捉咗
係44年佢地冇利用價值之後
被送去Mauthausen集中營槍斃
集中營入面有囚犯因為尊重呢批特工
特意將佢地既骨灰分開埋
今時今日有個墓碑(40個荷蘭人, 6個英國人, 一個法國人)
The secret agents were brought into the camp on September 6, in 1944. After the killing in the following days, their bodies were cremated. Close to the crematorium, some other prisoners were busy with work in the ground. They have with respect for the agents, seen what they had to suffer, and with risk for their own lives, they had buried the container with the ashes on that place. In 1968 on that place is unveiled a plaque on the ground. On the wall one is located with the names of the 47 agents. The names of 40 Dutch, 6 British and 1 French agent.



咁最尾點完?
一段時間之後英國發現唔對路
有兩個特工走到出黎經瑞士西班牙番到英國(雖然被人當雙面間諜)
加上皇家空軍發現執行荷蘭SOE行動既飛機好安全冇被人射落黎
德國見再冇人上當
負責個個人Giskes 就係44年4月1日send 封冇加密既電話比英國
"喂 你地之前係荷蘭都玩得好開心wo
仲乜停晒手啊
得閒再黎玩啊"
To [the SOE section chiefs] Messrs Blunt, Bingham and Succs Ltd., London. In the last time you are trying to make business in Netherlands without our assistance stop we think this rather unfair in view of our long and successful co-operation as your sole agents stop but never mind whenever you will come to pay a visit to the Continent you may be assured that you will be received with the same care and result as all those who you sent us before stop so long.

二戰臨尾好串嘴個個Giskes被英軍捉咗
戰後幫美國打工

Real concrete evidence for this double-act theory has never been provided. Moreover, many who have been involved in British intelligence services consider it unlikely that in this way, apart from the Dutch agents, many British compatriots would also be put at mortal danger, such as pilots and crews of downed aircraft. On the other hand, it has been confirmed that the SOE was regarded by various fellow intelligence services, such as MI6, as an inexperienced and not very professional service, with which one would rather not cooperate.
